VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v_pengaman_tot_` AS select `pengamanan`.`id_bukuinduk` AS `id_bukuinduk`,sum(`pengamanan`.`biaya_pengamanan`) AS `tot_pengaman` from `pengamanan` where (`pengamanan`.`tambah_aset` = 1) group by `pengamanan`.`id_bukuinduk`
